interface.name: org.freedesktop.Telepathy.ChannelDispatcher.Interface.Hints.DRAFT
interface.tp:causes-havoc: a staging area for future functionality

tp:docstring.p: This interface contains functionality which we intend to incorporate into the ChannelDispatcher interface in future. It should be considered to be conceptually part of the core ChannelDispatcher interface, but without API or ABI guarantees.
